title: GDG DevFest NL 2017 is coming!
brief: We're are proud to announce the fifth annual GDG DevFest NL 2017—the biggest Google related event in The Netherlands, carefully crafted by the GDG community! The event will take place on **November 18th** in Amsterdam.

title: Call for papers!
brief: GDG DevFest The Netherlands 2017 has been announced! The fifth annual edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in the Netherlands will take on **November 18th** in Amsterdam.
